name: Glyph Demo
description:
Glyph’s gameplay combines breathtaking aerial maneuvers with tranquil exploration in a stunning 3D platforming experience. Add a mesmerizing original soundscape, and Glyph is lifting you up and whisking you away.

The Glyph DEMO includes:
- 3 exclusive levels that are only available in the DEMO.
- Approximately 45 minutes of playtime.
- Plenty of replayability as you hone your skills.
- Freeness. DEMOs are free. Which most people agree is good.

Be sure to join our Discord for the weekly Glyph challenges! --> https://discord.gg/FCQj4C5

The full version of Glyph is currently available on both  Steam and Nintendo Switch!
